amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to establish a Race to the Top model to award supplementary grants to state applicants based on evidence of previous voting system security reforms and plans for implementing additional innovations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Connolly.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
